events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your online store and would like to request a refund because it does not fit properly and I am not satisfied with the purchase.
The customer's message mentions requesting a refund due to dissatisfaction and size issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Sarah Thompson in the refunds department for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been used or washed to process the refund smoothly?
My order number is 987654321. I have not worn or washed the jacket; it is in the same condition as when I received it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid shipping label for the return.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your refund request.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the smooth process and excellent customer service!
We have sent you a short survey to let us know how you felt about your refund experience with our customer support team.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and rated the experience very positively, citing fast and helpful support.
The refund case has been formally closed following customer confirmation of receipt and satisfaction with our service.
This refund case has been archived automatically as no further action is expected.
